locations.name: Main Exit
locations.description: Use the main exit located on the ground floor.
locations.safetyInstructions: Stay calm and follow the designated evacuation routes. Assist others who may need help, but prioritize your own safety. Do not use elevators during an evacuation.

locations.name: Staircase B
locations.description: Staircase B leads to the secondary exit.
locations.safetyInstructions: Follow the staircase B to the secondary exit. Be cautious of your surroundings.

locations.name: Rocket Shelter
locations.description: Proceed to the designated rocket shelter immediately.
locations.safetyInstructions: Move quickly to the nearest rocket shelter. Follow instructions from emergency personnel. Stay indoors if unable to reach a shelter in time.

locations.name: Underground Bunker
locations.description: Access the underground bunker for additional safety.
locations.safetyInstructions: Head to the underground bunker for added protection. Follow safety guidelines.

locations.name: Open Ground
locations.description: Evacuate to the nearest open ground away from buildings.
locations.safetyInstructions: Drop, cover, and hold on during the shaking. Evacuate to open areas away from tall structures. Expect aftershocks and take precautions.

locations.name: Emergency Exit C
locations.description: Use Emergency Exit C for a quick exit from the building.
locations.safetyInstructions: Utilize Emergency Exit C for a swift exit. Follow emergency exit signs.

locations.name: Coastal Area
locations.description: Evacuate to higher ground immediately to avoid the tsunami.
locations.safetyInstructions: Move to higher ground without delay. Follow official warnings and instructions. Avoid coastal areas until authorities declare it safe.

locations.name: Evacuation Boat
locations.description: Use evacuation boats if available and follow instructions.
locations.safetyInstructions: Board evacuation boats safely. Follow the crew's instructions.
